## SAFETY OFFICERS (Rule 1030)

| Level | Training | Workers (High Risk) | Workers (Low Risk) | Type |
|-------|----------|---------------------|-------------------|------|
| SO1 | 8 hours | 1-9 | 1-50 | Part-time |
| SO2 | 40 hours | 10-50 | 51-199 | Part-time |
| SO3 | 80 hours + 2 yrs exp | 51-199 | 200-500 | Full-time |
| SO4 | OSH Practitioner | 200+ | 500+ | Full-time |

**Key Points:**
- Training must be from DOLE-accredited providers
- SO3 requires 2 years experience as SO2
- SO4 requires OSH Practitioner certification
- High-risk: construction, mining, manufacturing
- Low-risk: offices, retail, services
